subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Martin Brodeur tied Bernie Parent’s single-season record for victories by a goalie and Lou Lamoriello got a win in his return to coaching last night as the Devils defeated the visiting Ottawa Senators, 2-1.
snippet: Martin Brodeur tied Bernie Parent’s single-season record for victories by a goalie and Lou Lamoriello got a win in his return to coaching last night as the Devils defeated the visiting Ottawa Senators, 2-1.
